thread.title: Glacier White PlayStation 4 slim model announced, released this month
thread.title_full: Glacier White PlayStation 4 slim model announced, released this month

title: Glacier White PlayStation 4 slim model announced, released this month
text:
Glacier White PlayStation 4 slim model announced, released this month Looks quite ice. By Tom Phillips Published 10/01/2017 
Sony has announced the Glacier White PlayStation 4 model, which will go on sale in the UK within weeks - on 24th January. 
The console is the slimmer PS4 variant introduced last year and comes with a 500GB hard drive. 
Sony's announcement suggests the console is a permanent new addition rather than a limited edition. Here's a closer look at the design: 
Does anyone not have a PS4 yet?
